terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.draftNotice: [DRAFT VERSION] This document is a provisional version for a service under development.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of News for Problem ("Service"). By using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Our Service matches the latest AI technology trends with corporate challenges to deliver new solution possibilities. Users can register their challenges and receive notifications about relevant technical information.

items.responsibility: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information.
items.security: Proper password management and prohibition of sharing with third parties.
items.accuracy: Maintaining accuracy and currency of registration information.

items.lawful: Prohibition of activities that violate laws, regulations, or public order.
items.noHarm: Prohibition of activities that harm other users or third parties.
items.noInfringement: Prohibition of intellectual property infringement or unauthorized access.

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.content: We appropriately protect users' personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Our Service is provided 'as is' without any warranties regarding completeness, accuracy, or reliability. We assume no responsibility for any damages arising from the use of our Service.

termination.title: Service Suspension and Termination
termination.content: We may temporarily suspend or terminate all or part of the Service without prior notice. We may also suspend or delete accounts of users who violate these Terms.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these Terms as necessary. Modified Terms become effective upon publication on our website. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at the following address.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.draftNotice: [DRAFT VERSION] This document is a provisional version for a service under development.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: News for Problem ("Service") respects user privacy and is committed to appropriate protection of personal information. This Privacy Policy explains the personal information we collect, use, store, and disclose in our Service.

items.personal: Personal information such as name, email address, date of birth, occupation, and industry
items.usage: Service usage status, access logs, and click information
items.technical: IP address, browser information, and device information
items.communication: Content of inquiries and support communications

items.service: Providing, maintaining, and improving the Service
items.communication: Communication with users and providing support
items.improvement: Service quality improvement and new feature development
items.legal: Fulfilling legal obligations and preventing unauthorized use

sharing.title: Third-Party Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not provide personal information to third parties without user consent, except in the following cases:

items.legal: When mandatory disclosure is required by law
items.business: In case of business transfer, merger, etc.

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to prevent unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, or leakage of personal information.

cookies.title: Use of Cookies
cookies.content: Our Service uses cookies to improve user convenience and service improvement. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings, but some service functions may be limited.

items.access: Right to request disclosure of personal information
items.correction: Right to request correction, addition, or deletion of personal information
items.deletion: Right to request suspension or deletion of personal information use
items.portability: Right to data portability of personal information

retention.title: Information Retention Period
retention.content: Personal information is retained for the period necessary to achieve the purpose of use or for the period stipulated by law. After the retention period expires, it will be safely disposed of in an appropriate manner.

children.title: Children's Information
children.content: Our Service is not intended for children under 13 years of age, and we do not intentionally collect personal information from children under 13.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: This Privacy Policy may be changed as necessary. In case of significant changes, we will notify users in advance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions or requests regarding the handling of personal information, please contact us at the following address.
